practice_phrases.target: I started to think about something
I started to think about it
I started to think about this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我昨天开始考虑这件事
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about it yesterday

practice_phrases.known: 我开始考虑我想说什么
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about what I wanted to say

practice_phrases.known: 我开始考虑上个月说英语
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about speaking English last month

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上开始考虑如何说得更好
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about how to speak better this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我开始仔细考虑我想对你说什么
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about what I wanted to say to you carefully

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上开始考虑这件事因为我不确定答案是什么
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about it this morning because I was not sure what the answer was

practice_phrases.known: 我开始考虑一完成就如何与他人说话
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about how to speak with other people as soon as I finish
